mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_things(content, is_emergency, period_type, create_user_id, start_time, end_time, update_time, delete_flag) VALUES(#{content}, #{isEmergency}, #{periodType}, #{createUserId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{updateTime}, 1)
mapper.update: update tb_things set content=#{content}, is_emergency=#{isEmergency}, period_type=#{periodType}, end_time=#{endTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} where things_id=#{thingsId}
mapper.select: select * from tb_things where things_id=#{thingsId} and delete_flag=1
